articles.title: Could Brian Thomas Jr. be a legitimate trade target for Patriots this offseason?
articles.description:
Brian Thomas Jr. recorded over 1,200 receiving yards in his first season with the Jags.

The post Could Brian Thomas Jr. be a legitimate trade target for Patriots this offseason? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots may target Brian Thomas Jr. for trade this offseason.
Thomas recorded over 1,200 receiving yards in his rookie season with the Jaguars.
Acquiring Thomas could enhance the Patriots' receiving corps for the upcoming season.

articles.title: 3 takeaways from Team USA men’s hockey’s OT win over Sweden in Olympics
articles.description:
Quinn Hughes' OT winner pushed Team USA past Sweden on Wednesday.

The post 3 takeaways from Team USA men’s hockey’s OT win over Sweden in Olympics appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Quinn Hughes scored the overtime winner, securing Team USA's victory over Sweden.
This win boosts Team USA's chances in the Olympic hockey tournament.
Boston Bruins' Charlie McAvoy contributes to Team USA's success, enhancing local fan engagement.

articles.title: Pittsfield armored vehicle company is largest ICE contract in Mass.
articles.description:
Lenco has scored $5.2 million in contracts since last year, and its BearCat's "militarized aesthetic" has been a visual centerpiece of some ICE operations.

The post Pittsfield armored vehicle company is largest ICE contract in Mass. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Lenco, based in Pittsfield, secured $5.2 million in ICE contracts since last year.
The BearCat vehicle, used by ICE, features a militarized design that raises community concerns.
Boston residents may see increased ICE operations and heightened security measures in the area.
